comments.body: I have this feeling that this project will take off and will be one of the premier and top gambling guides here in the industry I don't know who the old timers are behind this project, all I know is they are experienced and they know what the community wants I liked their tagline something the community really need Unbiased & Outspoken.Congratulation and looking forward to what you can offer to the community.

comments.body: Nice one casino critique, it's a beautiful Ann and also a good idea launching a casino reviewing project, and I hope you achieve your goal of becoming the leader in casino guide by your set year of 2027.I have a little concern by the way (not my business but just wanna know), how are you managing or intend to fund this project?We all know that becoming a leader in anything requires alot of efforts and marketing, marketing (most especially) requires funds.Is there any paid service offered by you through which you raise money to keep the project alive or do you just depend ad revenues and your personal purse?

comments.author: Casino Critique
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on September 18, 2022, 02:22:00 AMwell he knows what he's doingEvery little exposure helps us to spread the name around.When people visit the site they take note of the content on the site. There are social media handles to follow us to receive updates. Interested visitors will follow such channels where we post updates. Eventually they will know once the platform is live.Â  QuoteI saw on their website about the chip, in this investment part I didn't see it as advantageous for me, the profit would be very low and I would have to pray that there were few people in the pool.It does not matter for a Chip offerer how many participants we will have in our IBCO. The return for a chip is calculated against the total number of chips which is 9,999. If we use an example for a month then it will be clear a bit.Assume in a month x, our revenue is $100kSo, for the month x, $10K is associated with 9,999 Chip.Which means each chip will allocate $1 for that month.If a participant have 100 Chip then s/he will get $100 for that month.Let's not discuss more about it in this topic. Please feel free to ask any question you have related to IBCO in the IBCO thread which is in the securities board.About Casino guru, askgambler and other leaders in the industry:Everyone started from ground zero before becoming a figure in the industry. It's the same for us too. Quote from: Nrcewker on September 18, 2022, 03:14:26 AMNevertheless the OPâ€™s design is really impressive and looks very much professional.Letâ€™s see what more unique features you provide for your visitors in the site.Thank you. Once the platform will be ready we will remove the landing page that we have currently. If you like our project and wants to receive regular updates then feel free to subscribe to our social channels especially, Telegram and Twitter.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: I feel that the thread might be misleading to many because there's no sign of any ICO until the user clicks on the banner, expecting to see a complete review site. Can't blame some that get annoyed, like Slow death.Amending the title would be a good suggestion.My 2 cents.

comments.author: Strongkored

Can't blame some that get annoyed, like Slow death.Amending the title would be a good suggestion.My 2 cents.They already had a previous ANN which contained information about the IBCO they were working on but it looks like it was moved by mods and now they are making a new ANN which doesn't contain the same stuff only about the website they are developing.I just don't understand why anyone can say that this is a nice website with it unfinished

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: Was expecting to see a great site after checking out the slick ANN, but was disappointed to see a placeholder saying 'Coming Soon'. This thread's title should be renamed as 'CasinoCritique.com Coming Soon' in my opinion.'Unbaised and Outspoken' are some bold declarations which is why I am looking forward to how your site competes with sites like BTCGOSU etc in the future. All the best!
